body.p: My administration as a justice of the peace ended the of June. In closing of my court of , I wish to thank my friends and for their brotherly support that I have received for the past 24 years that I have been in office.
I wish to say that while in office I tried best and most sincerely to serve all of you people.

Our poor fellow-men, who must suffer so much, knowing the English language and advice, always have found in my court a free sulation. All the time and everywhere I tried to serve my nation sincerely. For the past 24 years of court service, I haven's benefited much financially, but to me today it means a great deal to have serve you for nothing, than to have received a steady financial in.

During long term in office I have know what a great deal of annoyances and what big losses our Polish people suffered in other courts.
